title: Mill on the Floss imagery gables

content.question: The narrator most likely includes the image of the “dark-red gables” in the description of the outdoors in the first paragraph to

choices.label: parallel the dark mood of the characters
present a landscape appropriate for Christmas
foreshadow a scene of outdoor children’s games
introduce a contrast between the indoors and outdoors

content.answer: introduce a contrast between the indoors and outdoors

skill.text: Skill 5.D: Identify and explain the function of an image or imagery.
